creditline: Gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council with proceeds from the 2004 Antiques Show and Sale and the 2003 Art Nouveau Excursion
description: Art Nouveau style; sweeping handles; symmetrical cluster of buds on long, thin stems sprout from a point at one edge of the tray; five flattened ball feet
object_name: Tray, from a five-piece coffee and tea service
signed: to left of bud cluster, incised: [Follot]
title: Tray, from a five-piece coffee and tea service
